subject: Re: [junit]Help me!
msgSnippet: hello, JUnit users I am a Junit user in China. I found Junit test in Java really helpful but I couldn t get it from local bookstore because of copyright
messageBody:
hello, JUnit users

I am a Junit user in China. I found "Junit test in Java" really helpful
but I couldn't get it from local bookstore because of copyright issue.
Does anybody know whether there is any e_copy of the book available
somewhere? I wish I could translate the book into chinese and that may
help people a lot.

thank u!!!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
